content: this crochet star stitch coaster is easy and quick to make using three rounds of double_crochet stitches and a star stitch border the sample coaster used 100% cotton along with a g 4 mm crochet hook for the center and h 5 mm crochet hook for the edging feel free to use any other size hook and fiber content there is a step-by-step tutorial video for this pattern enjoy donna wolfe from naztazia
